channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: 'She's awesome': How U.S. veterans helped Venezuela's Machado escape
item.description: In a daring nighttime martime operation, U.S. veterans whisked Venezuela's María Corina Machado out of the country to claim her Nobel Peace Prize in Oslo
item.content:encoded:
In a daring nighttime martime operation, U.S. veterans whisked Venezuela's María Corina Machado out of the country to claim her Nobel Peace Prize in Oslo

(Image credit: ODD ANDERSEN)
item.dc:creator: Carrie Kahn

item.title: A momentous week as Syria celebrates lifting U.S. sanctions and a year without Assad
item.description: As they mark the first anniversary of toppling Bashar al-Assad's regime, Syrians also celebrate another coming milestone: the lifting of sanctions, which could help give the country a new start.
item.content:encoded:
As they mark the first anniversary of toppling Bashar al-Assad's regime, Syrians also celebrate another coming milestone: the lifting of sanctions, which could help give the country a new start.

(Image credit: Omar Albam)
item.dc:creator: Jane Arraf

item.title: The Justice Department has now sued 18 states in an effort to access voter data
item.description: The Department of Justice has sued four more states as part of the Trump administration's far-reaching attempt to access sensitive voter data. The DOJ is also suing Fulton County in Georgia.
item.content:encoded:
The Department of Justice has sued four more states as part of the Trump administration's far-reaching attempt to access sensitive voter data. The DOJ is also suing Fulton County in Georgia.

(Image credit: Jason Connolly)
item.dc:creator: NPR Washington Desk

item.title: In photos: Flooding in Western Washington state forces thousands to evacuate
item.description: Record flooding in Washington state has forced tens of thousands of people to evacuate after torrential rains this week.
item.content:encoded:
Record flooding in Washington state has forced tens of thousands of people to evacuate after torrential rains this week.

(Image credit: Megan Farmer)
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 sweeps The Game Awards — analysis and full winners list
item.description: Independent video game Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 swept the Game Awards last night. The L.A. ceremony draws millions of views for its industry honors and exclusive previews of upcoming games.
item.content:encoded:
Independent video game Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 swept the Game Awards last night. The L.A. ceremony draws millions of views for its industry honors and exclusive previews of upcoming games.

(Image credit: Frank Micelotta/Picturegroup)
item.dc:creator: James Perkins Mastromarino

item.title: If the holidays are stressing you out, remember: everything is optional
item.description: Managing a full December calendar can quickly take you from festive to frazzled. Psychotherapist Niro Feliciano shares advice on reducing stress and increasing joy this season.
item.content:encoded:
All is Calmish: How to Feel Less Frantic and More Festive During the Holidays, shares advice on reducing stress and increasing joy this season.'/>

Managing a full December calendar can quickly take you from festive to frazzled. Psychotherapist Niro Feliciano shares advice on reducing stress and increasing joy this season.

(Image credit: Julia Neroznak)
item.dc:creator: Marielle Segarra

item.title: Trial starts for a Wisconsin judge accused of obstructing ICE
item.description: Was Judge Hannah Dugan trying to obstruct a proceeding or trying to run her courtroom when ICE agents came to arrest an undocumented immigrant? A federal jury will decide
item.content:encoded:
Was Judge Hannah Dugan trying to obstruct a proceeding or trying to run her courtroom when ICE agents came to arrest an undocumented immigrant? A federal jury will decide

(Image credit: Scott Olson)
item.dc:creator: Maayan Silver

item.title: Germany's train service is one of Europe's worst. How did it get so bad?
item.description: You won't arrive on time and may not even get a seat. Your booking might get lost. Things have gotten so dire that a foreigner has been brought in to shake things up.
item.content:encoded:
You won't arrive on time and may not even get a seat. Your booking might get lost. Things have gotten so dire that a foreigner has been brought in to shake things up.

(Image credit: Tobias Schwarz)
item.dc:creator: Esme Nicholson

item.title: CNN has endured turmoil for years. Now Trump wants role in its fate
item.description: In the corporate battle over parent company Warner Bros. Discovery, CNN's fate remains up for grabs. President Trump wants a say in what happens next.
item.content:encoded:
In the corporate battle over parent company Warner Bros. Discovery, CNN's fate remains up for grabs. President Trump wants a say in what happens next.

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: David Folkenflik

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia released from ICE custody. And, Indiana rejects redistricting
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia, a man the Trump administration mistakenly deported in March and eventually returned, is now free from ICE custody. And, Indiana lawmakers reject a redistricting proposal.
item.content:encoded:
Kilmar Abrego Garcia, a man the Trump administration mistakenly deported in March and eventually returned, is now free from ICE custody. And, Indiana lawmakers reject a redistricting proposal.

(Image credit: Roberto Schmidt)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton
